{"id":278485643,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 years, 6 months","timestamp":1573656793,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/278485643/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"11.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int i ,len = s.length(); \n        int currlen, st = 0, maxlen = 0;  \n        unordered_map<char, int> pos;\n\n        if (s[0] && len)\n            pos[s[0]] = 0; \n  \n        //cout << len << \"\\n\";\n        for (i = 1; i < len; i++) { \n            if (pos.find(s[i]) == pos.end()) \n                pos[s[i]] = i; \n            else { \n                if (pos[s[i]] >= st) { \n                    currlen = i - st; \n                    if (maxlen < currlen) \n                        maxlen = currlen;\n                    st = pos[s[i]] + 1; \n                } \n            pos[s[i]] = i; \n            }\n        } \n        if ((maxlen < i - st) && len > 0) { \n            maxlen = i - st;  \n        } \n        return maxlen;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false}
